description: Create a complete restaurant website for Nick's Street Eats in Fremont, Nebraska. They serve the BEST hot dogs and baked potatoes around. Location: 1616 N Bell Street, Fremont, NE. Open Wednesday-Saturday, 11am-4pm. They also offer catering services. The site needs: a bold hero section showcasing their specialty hot dogs and baked potatoes (use hot-dog-hero-uL8Wb.png and baked-potato-hero-kLViH.png), an about section highlighting they moved from food cart to brick and mortar location, a menu section featuring hot dogs (Chicago dog, Coney dog, New York dog) and loaded baked potatoes with various toppings, hours and location info prominently displayed, catering information section, and a contact section. Make it feel authentic, local, and appetizing with a street food vibe.

Implement a full online ordering system with shopping cart functionality. Users should be able to browse the menu, select hot dogs or baked potatoes, customize toppings and options, add items to cart, view cart with quantity adjustments, enter delivery/pickup details, and complete checkout. Include order summary and confirmation. Make the ordering flow intuitive and mobile-friendly.
Add a catering inquiry form where customers can request catering services for parties and events. Include fields for event date, number of guests, menu preferences, and contact information.
